name: The Man (Michael_Willner)
description:
A group of picky and rambunctious middle schoolers are tired of always being told what they can and can't do. It seems like the world is against them, but nobody said growing up was easy. It’s up to the gang to stick it to The Man with what they know best and save the world from its toxic influences.

This project is the result of months of work with the base Unity 2D packages and SDK’s. A basic license of Unity Teams was used for version control and collaboration amongst the team.

This game was made by James Lilicrap (Programming), David Ducharme (Management/Audio), and, yours truly, Michael Willner (Art).
